DOCNAME: CASE OF VIKENTIJEVIK v. "THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF MACEDONIA"

Furthermore , ORG had not been entitled to intervene in the proceedings in order to protect the interests of third parties . The applicant argued that the Commission , by quashing the relevant decisions over DATE after they had been adopted , had violated the principle of legal certainty and irrevocability of final decisions .
